interest_drivers: Introduction of syftr OSS for programmatically finding and tuning agentic workflows
Validation from NVIDIA for production-grade AI
Integration with SAP for enterprise planning
Leader in Gartner Magic Quadrant for Data Science and Machine Learning Platforms
ai_analysis.summary: DataRobot introduces syftr OSS and highlights its leadership in the Gartner Magic Quadrant, while also showcasing its integration with SAP and validation from NVIDIA, demonstrating significant technical advances and business impact in the AI and ML space.
